content.rendered:
Traditional Style Burger

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 Box FRY’S TRADITIONAL BURGERS
1/2 Can of tomato and onion mix
1 tbsp Chutney
1/2 Garlic clove, crushed
75ml Mustard
200ml Barbeque sauce
Salt and pepper
4 Seeded buns
Olive oil for grilling
2 Medium gherkins, sliced
1 Red Onion, thinly sliced
1 Tomato, sliced
Rocket

Directions

For the relish:

Place tomato and onion mix in small barbecue cast iron pot, add chutney and garlic.
Place pot on barbeque and simmer for 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

For the marinade:

Combine BBQ sauce and mustard to create basting for Burgers.

Grill the Traditional Burgers on the barbeque for 8 minutes, or until cooked through, basting and turning regularly.

Slice the buns in half, lightly brush with olive oil, toast lightly on the barbeque.
Assemble the burger: Layer with relish, sliced tomato and watercress. Add the Burgers, gherkins, red onion and more relish.
